line_1: The other left the room outright;
line_2: One sidled to the window quite,

line_1: The other left the room outright;
Why then our only business is outright
line_2: To take our caps, and bid the World good night.

line_1: Who hurl the Wretch, as if to Hell outright,
line_2: Even feigning Virtue; skilful to unite

line_1: Who hurl the Wretch, as if to Hell outright,
line_2: But for those Fiends, whom Blood and Broils delight;

line_1: Who hurl the Wretch, as if to Hell outright,
line_2: Or hold him clambering all the fearful Night

line_1: Who say the mob are mad outright,
line_2: Such civil broils are my delight,
And, for he knew 'twould please the Knight,
